TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed StatusBarPanelAutoSize extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how a on a control behaves when the control resizes.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property specifies how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> is autosized on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the StatusBarPanelAutoSize enumeration and how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event.
To run the example, paste the following code in a form. Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.s_22_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.s_22_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.windows.forms.s_22_1.cpp)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize Contents = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The width of the is determined by its contents.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize None = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The does not change size when the control resizes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize Spring = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The shares the available space on the (the space not taken up by other panels whose property is set to None or Contents) with other panels that have their property set to Spring.
